result_list.explanation: The stage direction describes an object (a grand mirror) being brought onto the stage and an interaction of a character with this object (Angélique seeing herself).
result_list.stgdir: On apporte un grand Miroir, Angélique s'y voit fort laide, et s'en va toute fâchée.
